code: import{LOCALHOST}from"../utils/Constants";import{getToken}from"./Login";export function UpdateUserApi(user){var uri="".concat(LOCALHOST,"/actualizar");var _user=user;var params={method:"PUT",headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(getToken()),"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify(_user)};return fetch(uri,params).then(function(response){if(response.status>=400)return{code:response.status,message:"No se ha podido actualizar los datos del usuario"};console.log("OK");return response.json();}).then(function(result){return result;}).catch(function(error){return error;});}
